name: disturb
content:
disturb verb [T]
(INTERRUPT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 to interrupt what someone is doing: Please don't disturb your sister - she's trying to do her homework. I'm sorry to disturb you so late, but my car's broken down and I don't have my phone with me. disturb the peace
to break the law by behaving unpleasantly and noisily in public: Several fans were arrested and charged with disturbing the peace after the game.
